title: Enchanted
description: Caryn Jones has been living on her beloved New Mexico ranch since she was a child. Except it's not her ranch ... it belongs to her long-estranged stepbrother, Rafe Collins. Now that Caryn's stepfather has died, Rafe is coming to claim his inheritance and evict his stepsister from his property. Caryn remembers the billionaire industrialist as a surly, moody jerk, and her opinion of him hasn't changed much ... so why is she falling for him?
author: Taryn James
